comment: To more Bike rides(ofc I am on passenger seat) together in US🍷, if in case I got time to visit you there 🎃, dhyaan rakhna bhai apna US mein, keep me updated ;) thank you for being the advisor you are to me!

comment: My biggest gym motivation (also big in size 🦍), always pushing me to get better at gym. Learnt how to express my emotions from you and Akshay, always helped me feel better on my low days. Also my perfect non jaat jaat friend.🦸🏻🤫🧏🏻

comment: Together we gonna miss parenting Akshay, he never learns.....The dap ups and memories were lit.....Stop being a typical gujju 😂. OG roommate

comment: Aeyo! Who’s that squatting 150? Oh it’s Het😮‍💨. One of the most intellectual person I’ve met. Kudos to both our “emo” and “Philosophical Talks”. Thanks for being always Inn! Always stay the same and maintain the ‘Lessgoo We Ball’ attitude. Fam for Life✌️

comment:
the gym motivator of our gang. We have shared laughters and tears together. Always loved your excitement for even smallest of things.
The trips we had , the all night bkc were dayz to smile at. You were an incredible person , learnt a lot from you. Soon be visiting US until then keep smiling.

comment: From IVDC teammates to higher studies buddies to roommates at CMU!  We have come a long way. Thanks for helping me out for all the SOP, LOR, visa stuff, and of course, the dating tips and tricks. Muscle man, I will see you soon in Pittsburgh. Masti karenge, treks pe jaaenge, and double dates too 😉

comment: Kaafi kuch seekha hai, kaafi kuch seekhna hai, kaafi kuch apply krna hai :), all thanks to you Guruji! Thanks for always motivating! Lage raho aur apni kahaniyaan sunakar hame jalate raho....Wishing you the best!

comment:

comment: gonna miss you a lot maalik😭 take care and all the best for your future endeavours, mujhe bhulna mat.

comment: Hate Bhaiiii🗿🗿🙌 Het in appearance - hacker h bhai hacker h🤣🙌🙌. Apna Inter IIT reh gya yr 🤫. but koi na bhot maze kare h sath mai. Tu yaad rakhna UCSD mai mera kaam🌚🤣. Keep giving tips body builder. All the best, keep dancing, party hard. Bnglr mai miss ho gya yr, one last time chale?

comment: Embodiment of confidence. You came across as a hip-hop lover, and that's what started a good interaction with you. Good luck with your future plans bro. Hope we can meet up soon.
